title: 求召唤 闪电苦力怕 蜘蛛骑士 小鸡骑士的命令方块指令
author: 蓝.界

replies.author: qzawxs
replies.txt_content: /summon Creeper ~0 ~0 ~0 {powered:1}高压爬行者，生成蜘蛛骑士的命令是 /summon Skeleton ~2 ~ ~ {Riding:{id: Spider}, Equipment: [{id: 261}]}，生成洞穴蜘蛛骑士的命令是 /summon Skeleton ~2 ~ ~ {Riding:{id: CaveSpider}, Equipment: [{id: 261}]}，生成凋零骑士（手持石剑）的命令是 /summon Skeleton ~2 ~ ~ {SkeletonType:1， Riding:{id: Spider}, Equipment: [{id: 272}]}，/summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {IsBaby:1,Riding:{id:Chicken,IsChickenJockey:1}}鸡骑士

replies.author: siiftun1857
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 siiftun1857 于 2015-2-2 14:22 编辑 
/summon Creeper ~ ~ ~ {powered:1b,}#高压爬行者
/summon Skeleton ~ ~ ~ {Riding:{id:"Spider"},Equipment:[0:{id:"minecraft:bow"},1:{},2:{},3:{},4:{},],}#蜘蛛骑士
/summon Zombie ~ ~ ~ {IsBaby:1b,Riding:{id:"Chicken",IsChickenJockey:1b,},}#僵尸鸡骑士复制代码

replies.author: 龙腾猫跃
replies.txt_content:
siiftun1857 发表于 2015-2-2 14:19
看了你的签名档我深深的同感TwT！精通MC各种基础，红石，命令，NBT，json，会写VB，JS，MCPE插件……建筑只会火柴盒……
